synopsis.text: Serialised in Manga Time Kirara magazine since 2007, the members of the Light Music Club are gearing up for their final days in high school. Yui, Ritsu, Mio, and Tsumugi, the four 3rd-year students, along with their junior, Azusa, decide to embark on a post-graduation trip. After a little help from their beloved pet turtle, Ton-chan, the girls set their sights on London. As they navigate through famous landmarks, perform live music, and indulge in delicious food, the girls embark on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, and unforgettable memories. But as the end of their high school days approaches, the girls must prepare for heartfelt goodbyes and one last amazing encore together. One thing is certain - the unbreakable bond they've formed will carry on long after the final scene rolls.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
